Package com.scorch.core.commands

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACommand
    Staff Chat command, can be used by everyone but can only be seen by the sender and staff in the same server Permissions
    scorch.command.a - Access to /a
    scorch.command.a.receive - View /a messages not sent by self
    BuildModeCommand
    Build Mode command, ability to modify the lobby/server physically, however changes are logged and can be rolled back by an admin
    Aliases: bm, build Permissions
    scorch.command.buildmode - Access to /buildmode
    scorch.command.buildmode.rollback - Access to rollback builds via /bm rollback
    scorch.command.buildmode.others - Access to specify a player
    scorch.command.buildmode.override - Access to enable override mode via /bm override
    scorch.command.buildmode.inspect - Access to enable inspection mode via /bm inspect
    BVersionCommand
    Get information on the latest build version that is currently on the server.
    FeedCommand
    Basic feed Sets the player's satuartion level Sets the player's food level Permissions
    scorch.command.feed - Access to command
    scorch.command.feed.others - Access to feed others
    scorch.command.feed.all - Access to feed all players
    FilterCommand
    Manage and update the filter Permissions
    FriendCommand
    TODO Friend Command for cross-server friend management
    GamemodeCommand
    Improved Gamemmode command for utility usage Permissions
    scorch.command.gamemode.others - Access to change other player's gamemodes
    scorch.command.gamemode.[GAMEMODE] - Access to specified gamemode
    HealCommand
    Basic heal command Sets the player's health Sets the player's satuartion level Sets the player's food level Sets the player's fire ticks Permissions
    scorch.command.heal - Access to command
    scorch.command.heal.others - Access to heal others
    scorch.command.heal.all - Access to heal all players
    HelpCommand
    Custom help command that responds with database message
    HistoryCommand
    Punishment History command Permissions
    scorch.command.history - Access to command
    scorch.command.history.others - Access to view other player's history
    LagCommand
    Get lag information Permissions
    scorch.command.lag - Access to command
    MACommand
    Messaging system meant for staff only Permissions
    scorch.command.ma - Access to command
    scorch.command.ma.watch - Access to view staff PMs not sent to/from directly
    PingCommand
    Tells the sender their ping Permissions
    scorch.command.ping - Access to command
    PlaytimeCommand
    Get playtime of players Permissions
    scorch.command.playtime - Access to command scorch.command.playtime.others - View other player's playtimes
    PunishCommand
    Punish command meant for staff Permissions
    scorch.command.punish - Access to command
    (Modify GUI to define permissions for each item/punishment)
    RACommand
    Extension of /MA command, used to send a staff message to the most recent player you sent a MA to Permissions
    scorch.command.ra - Access to command
    scorch.command.ma.watch - Access to view staff PMs not sent to/from directly
    SeenCommand
    View when a player was last on Permissions
    scorch.command.seen - Access to command
    TestCommand
    Command used by developers and internally for testing only Permissions
    scorch.command.test - Access to command
    ToggleCommand
    Command used to toggle commands/modules Permissions
    scorch.command.toggle - Access to command
    TPCommand
    Teleport command meant for general moderation or admins Permissions
    scorch.command.teleport - Access to command
    scorch.command.teleport.history - Access to view teleport history of self
    scorch.command.teleport.back - Access to teleport to previous teleport locations
    scorch.command.teleport.back.others - Access to force other players to teleport to previous teleport locations
    UnpunishCommand
    Internal console only command meant for emergency/backend usage only
    VanishCommand
    Staff command for moderation Permissions
    scorch.command.vanish - Access to command
    scorch.vanish.level.[level] - Used to see who can see who, higher level staff should get higher level numbers (OWNER: 100, CO-OWNER: 99, etc)
